hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Strength Upgrade#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path to the #Kokiri Emerald#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Climb East Chest

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Stick Capacity#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Flare Dancer atop the Fire Temple# guards a chest containing #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Crater# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Green Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Fire Temple Compass#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##Zora's Fountain## has #0# major items.

HC (Malon).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Stick Capacity#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Fire Temple Compass#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #a Goron Tunic# can be found in #Goron City#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Forest Temple#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Barinade# holds...^ #the Nocturne of Shadow# and #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Strength Upgrade#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found at #Gerudo's Fortress#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Queen Gohma# holds...^ #the Minuet of Forest# and #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Light Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Huge Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the song written in the #royal tomb# is #a Shadow Temple Compass#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path to the #Kokiri Emerald#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #2# major items.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #like-like in Ganon's Shadow Trial# guards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Water Trial Left Chest

ToT (Right).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Water Temple#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Bow#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

ZR (Near Domain).text: Did you know that you can reach the invisible Hookshot target before the fans room in Shadow Temple with just the Hookshot if you backflip onto the chest?

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Huge Rupee#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #the Tower#.
